Erimmator was a mage working for the Cult of the Dragon in the early mid-14 century DR.
At some point prior to the conception of Shandril Shessair, thus, in  at the most,As Shandril is 16 years old in 16 Flamerule of 1356, she mustve been born before 15 Flamerule 1340 and after 17 Flamerule 1339. The birthdate means she was conceived nine months prior, thus, before Marpenoth of 1339 and after Marpenoth of 1338. As the first range is wider, that one is accepted. Erimmator cursed an unwitting Garthond Shessair with a symbiotic balhiir during a spellbattle.
Gorstag believed him dead as of , though he didnt know where had he been buried. Together with Elminster, they had concluded at some point that Erimmator had cursed Garthond with the symbiotic baalhiir. They believed this was to find out if any child he conceived with Dammasae would have stronger spellfire abilities than the mother.
